Verify the sidebar item 'Settings' displays text 'Settings' with background color #e9ecef, color #007bff, font size 16px, font weight 600, padding 10px 15px, positioned left 0, width 200px, active true, border-left 4px solid #007bff, and a background-color transition of 0.2s
Confirm the sidebar container has height 100% viewport height, scroll position at top, visible true, top position 60px (below header), and allows vertical scrolling
Go to 'https://demo.example.com/upload'

Verify the file dropzone area shows text 'Drag & drop files here or click to browse' with background color #f0f8ff, border 2px dashed #007bff, border radius 8px, width 500px, height 150px, text align center, color #6c757d, font size 18px, aria-label 'File upload area', and opacity 1
Ensure the uploaded file list has count 0 (initially), is visible false (initially), margin-top 20px, x position 0, and width 500px
Perform an action that triggers a success toast

Verify the success toast message 'Item saved successfully!' has background color #28a745, color #ffffff, font size 16px, padding 15px 20px, border radius 6px, positioned bottom 20px and right 20px, visible true, opacity 1, animation 'slideInFromRight 0.5s ease-out' followed by 'fadeOut 0.8s 4.2s forwards', and loads within 500ms
Confirm the close button (X icon) has aria-label 'Dismiss notification', color #ffffff, font size 20px, positioned right 10px and top 5px (relative to toast edge)
Visit 'https://demo.example.com/config'
Verify the slider track has width 300px, height 8px, background color #e9ecef, border radius 4px, x position 50px, and y position 100px

Ensure the slider handle has value 75%, width 20px, height 20px, background color #007bff, border radius 50%, positioned left calc(75% - 10px) (relative to track) and top -6px (relative to track), is focused false, has a border 2px solid #ffffff, aria-label 'Volume level slider', and a background-color transition of 0.2s
Check map view at 'https://demo.example.com/location/store'

Verify the map watermark 'Powered by MapProvider' shows text 'Powered by MapProvider' with color rgba(0,0,0,0.5), font size 12px, font weight 400, positioned bottom 10px and right 10px, visible true, opacity 0.5, z-index 10, width 180px, and height 18px

Confirm the Zoom In button has aria-label 'Zoom in', background color #ffffff, color #333333, border 1px solid #ccc, border radius 4px, width 30px, height 30px, positioned top 20px and right 20px (relative to map container), and is enabled true
Go to 'https://demo.example.com/user/profile'

Verify the 'Profile' tab displays text 'Profile' with background color #ffffff, color #007bff, font size 16px, padding 10px 20px, border-bottom 2px solid #007bff, active true, left position 0, width 100px, font weight 600, text align center, and border-top-left-radius 4px and border-top-right-radius 4px

Ensure the content area for the 'Profile' tab is visible true, background color #f8f9fa, padding 20px, border 1px solid #dee2e6, positioned top 40px (below tabs), x position 0, height 300px, and opacity 1
